title: Chris Bryant – 2022 Comments Calling for a By-Election in West Suffolk
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Bryant, the Labour MP for Rhondda, on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content: If [@MattHancock](https://twitter.com/MattHancock) thinks representing his constituents is an inconvenience, his constituents should have a chance to decide whether they could bring that inconvenience to an end. [#byelectionnow](https://twitter.com/hashtag/byelectionnow?src=hashtag_click)
